summary.span: 為所有區塊層級動態內容項目提供基底的抽象類別。

span.span: An abstract class that provides a base for all block-level flow content elements.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 繼承自項目類別 (例如) 可用來分組同一個父系下的項目，或將通用屬性套用至群組。Elements that inherit from the class (such as ) can be used to group elements under a common parent or to apply common attributes to a group. 就概念而言，這是類似於您如何使用\ 標記中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_html](~/includes/tlasharptla-html-md.md)]。Conceptually, this is similar to how you might use the \
tag in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_html](~/includes/tlasharptla-html-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Thickness BorderThickness { System::Windows::Thickness get(); void set(System::Windows::Thickness value); };
member this.BorderThickness : System.Windows.Thickness with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定項目的框線粗細。

span.span: Gets or sets the border thickness for the element.

value.span: 結構，指定要套用的框線數量 (以與裝置無關的像素為單位)。

span.span: A structure specifying the amount of border to apply, in device independent pixels.

value.span: 預設值是粗細一致的零 (0.0)。

span.span: The default is a uniform thickness of zero (0.0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *uniformThickness**uniformThickness* 單一的字串表示法一致地套用所有的四個粗細維度值。String representation of a single value to apply uniformly to all four thickness dimensions. 例如，值`"10"`相當於針對`"10,10,10,10"`。For example, a value of `"10"` is equivalent to a value of `"10,10,10,10"`. 不合格的值被以與裝置無關的像素。An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels. 字串不需要明確包含小數位數。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. *independentThickness**independentThickness* 四個已排序的字串表示法值對應至獨立的粗細維度 left，top，以滑鼠右鍵，並 bottom，依此順序。String representation of four ordered values corresponding to independent thickness dimensions for left, top, right, and bottom, in this order. 四個值必須是以逗號分隔的;不允許有空格。The four values must be separated with commas; spaces are not allowed. 比方說，「 5,10,15,20"會導致 5 像素框線的左邊的內容、 內容上方的框線的 10 個像素、 15 像素框線右邊的內容和 20 個像素框線下方的內容。For example, "5,10,15,20" results in 5 pixels of border to the left of content, 10 pixels of border above content, 15 pixels of border to the right of content, and 20 pixels of border below the content. *qualifiedUniformThickness**qualifiedUniformThickness* 所描述的值*uniformThickness*後面接著一個下列的單位規範： `px`， `in`。A value described by *uniformThickness* followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` （預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 是英吋為單位;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px 比方說，`"1in"`提供統一的框線，往所有方向的 1 英吋。For example, `"1in"` provides uniform border of 1 inch in all directions. *qualifiedIndependentThickness**qualifiedIndependentThickness* 所描述的值*independentThickness*，以每個獨立的值，後面接著一個下列的單位規範： `px`， `in`。A value described by *independentThickness*, with each independent value followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` （預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 是英吋為單位;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px 例如，`"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`。For example, `"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`. 單位規範可能會混合，或從一個或多個值中省略。Unit specifiers may be mixed or omitted from one or more values. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定的屬性項目 ()。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element (). [!code-xaml[BlockSnippets#_Block_BordersXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_block_bordersxaml)] 下圖顯示上述範例的轉譯方式。The following figure shows how the preceding example renders. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 藍色，1/4 英吋框線圍繞在 Block 周圍](~/add/media/block-borders.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 圍繞在 Block 周圍的藍色，1/4 英吋框線")![Screenshot: Blue, 1/4inch border around Block](~/add/media/block-borders.png "Screenshot: Blue, 1/4inch border around Block") 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[BlockSnippets#_Block_Borders](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_block_borders)] [!code-vb[BlockSnippets#_Block_Borders](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_block_borders)]

member this.ClearFloaters : System.Windows.WrapDirection with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定方向，應該以這個方向重新定位 項目包含的任何 項目。

span.span: Gets or sets the direction in which any elements contained by a element should be repositioned.

value.span: 其中一個 值，指定從 項目包含的其他內容區隔任何 項目的方向。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the direction in which to separate any elements from other content contained in the element.

value.span: 預設值為 ，這個值表示應該在適當的位置呈現浮動器。

span.span: The default is , which indicates that floaters should be rendered in place.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會影響如何內配置內容旨在用來防止congesting 的內容中的項目項目。The property affects how content is laid out within a and is intended to be used to prevent elements from congesting the contents of a element. 指定此屬性可讓以統一的方向內重新定位的浮動器方向內容。Specifying a direction for this property causes floaters to be repositioned in a uniform direction within the content. Floater 不重新定位到其父代之外。Floaters are not repositioned outside of their parent . ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

member this.FlowDirection : System.Windows.FlowDirection with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 項目中內容的相對流向。

span.span: Gets or sets the relative direction for flow of content within a element.

value.span: 其中一個 值，這個值會指定相對流向。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the relative flow direction.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取得這個屬性會傳回目前有效的流向。Getting this property returns the currently effective flow direction. 設定此屬性會導致 項目的內容依指示的方向重新流動。Setting this property causes the contents of the element to re-flow in the indicated direction. 文字方向的內容通常會對應到所表示之語言的固有流向。The flow direction of content typically corresponds to the innate flow direction of the language being represented. 希伯來文和阿拉伯文會自然方向由右至左的語言的範例。Hebrew and Arabic are examples of languages that naturally flow from right to left. 英文、 德文和俄文會自然流程從左到右的語言的範例。English, German, and Russian are examples of languages that naturally flow from left to right. > [!NOTE] > **這個屬性的值不會自動變更為符合作業系統所使用的語言。如果您要使用不同值 th\*\*\*\*n 預設的** **，您必須指定它自己。****The value of this property is not automatically changed to match the language used by the operating system. If you need to use a different value th**a**n the default of** **, you must specify it yourself.** ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|、 , | ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定的屬性項目 ()。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element (). [!code-xaml[BlockSnippets#_Block_FlowDirectionXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_block_flowdirectionxaml)] 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[BlockSnippets#_Block_FlowDirection](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_block_flowdirection)] [!code-vb[BlockSnippets#_Block_FlowDirection](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_block_flowdirection)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsHyphenationEnabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsHyphenationEnabled : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，此值會指出是否啟用或停用字詞的自動斷字。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether automatic hyphenation of words is enabled or disabled.

value.span: 如果啟用自動斷字則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if automatic breaking and hyphenation of words is enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自動文字斷字功能可讓自動中斷和進行斷字的項目會根據目前的版面配置條件。The automatic word hyphenation feature enables a element to automatically break and hyphenate words, based on current layout conditions. 這可讓長字詞，若要開始在同一行，並繼續這個下一步，並傾向於達到合理的文字中的泛空白字元更均勻分佈。This enables long words to begin on one line and continue on this next, and tends to achieve a more even distribution of white space in justified text. 文字會中斷，並根據標準的文法規則進行無連字號。Words are broken and hyphenated according to standard grammar rules. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , | ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性的項目。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element. [!code-xaml[BlockSnippets#_Block_HyphenateXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_block_hyphenatexaml)] 下圖顯示上述範例的轉譯方式。The following figure shows how the preceding example renders. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 啟用 FlowDocument 連字號](~/add/media/flowdoc-hyphenenabled.png "螢幕擷取畫面： FlowDocument 連字號已啟用")![Screenshot: FlowDocument hyphen enabled](~/add/media/flowdoc-hyphenenabled.png "Screenshot: FlowDocument hyphen enabled") 下圖顯示相同的範例使用的預設設定的轉譯方式 = `false`。The following figure shows how the same example renders with the default setting of =`false`. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 已停用連字號的 FlowDocument](~/add/media/flowdoc-hyphendisabled.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 已停用連字號的 FlowDocument")![Screenshot: FlowDocument with disabled hyphens](~/add/media/flowdoc-hyphendisabled.png "Screenshot: FlowDocument with disabled hyphens") 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[BlockSnippets#_Block_Hyphenate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_block_hyphenate)] [!code-vb[BlockSnippets#_Block_Hyphenate](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_block_hyphenate)]

summary.span: 取得或設定每行內容的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of each line of content.

value.span: 範圍從 0.0034 到 160000 的每行行高 (以與裝置無關的像素為單位)，或 自動決定高度。

span.span: The height of each line in device independent pixels, in the range of 0.0034 to 160000, or to determine the height automatically.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值為(相當於屬性值`Auto`) 表示行高由目前字型特性自動決定。A value of (equivalent to an attribute value of `Auto`) indicates that the line height is determined automatically from the current font characteristics. 變更此值不會變更相關聯的文字; 的高度相反地，它會變更行包含文字的高度。Changing this value does not change the height of the associated text; rather, it changes the height of the line that contains the text. 若要變更文字的大小，請使用屬性。To change the size of the text, use the property. 除了這個屬性，版面配置中的總行受到其屬性。In addition to this property, the layout of lines in a is affected by its property. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *double**double* 字串表示法值等於或大於 0.0034 但等於或小於 160000。String representation of a value equal to or greater than 0.0034 but equal to or less than 160000. 不合格的值被以與裝置無關的像素。An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels. 字串不需要明確包含小數位數。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. *qualifiedDouble**qualifiedDouble* A*雙*值，上面所述 (但不支援`Auto`) 後面接著一個下列的單位規範： `px`， `in`， `cm`， `pt`。A *double* value as described above, (excepting `Auto`) followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`. `px` （預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 是英吋為單位;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` 是公釐。1cm==(96/2.54) 像素`cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` 為點;1pt==(96/72) 像素`pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px 自動Auto 行高由目前字型特性自動決定的原因。Causes the line height is determined automatically from the current font characteristics. 相當於屬性值。Equivalent to a property value of . ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , | ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性的項目。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element. [!code-xaml[BlockSnippets#_Block_LineHeightXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_block_lineheightxaml)] 下圖顯示上述範例的轉譯方式。The following figure shows how the preceding example renders. ![螢幕擷取畫面： FlowDocument LineHeight](~/add/media/flowdocument-lineheight.png "螢幕擷取畫面： FlowDocument LineHeight")![Screenshot: FlowDocument LineHeight](~/add/media/flowdocument-lineheight.png "Screenshot: FlowDocument LineHeight") 下圖顯示如何相同的預設設定以呈現 = 。The following figure shows how the same renders with the default setting of =. ![螢幕擷取畫面： FlowDocument lineheight](~/add/media/flowdocument-lineheightdefault.png "螢幕擷取畫面： FlowDocument lineheight 為預設值")![Screenshot: FlowDocument LineHeight default](~/add/media/flowdocument-lineheightdefault.png "Screenshot: FlowDocument LineHeight default") 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[BlockSnippets#_Block_LineHeight](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_block_lineheight)] [!code-vb[BlockSnippets#_Block_LineHeight](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_block_lineheight)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Thickness Margin { System::Windows::Thickness get(); void set(System::Windows::Thickness value); };
member this.Margin : System.Windows.Thickness with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定項目的邊界粗細。

span.span: Gets or sets the margin thickness for the element.

value.span: 結構，指定要套用的邊界數量 (以與裝置無關的像素為單位)。

span.span: A structure that specifies the amount of margin to apply, in device independent pixels.

value.span: 預設值是粗細一致的零 (0.0)。

span.span: The default is a uniform thickness of zero (0.0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是落在外部項目的內容區域，此項目的內容區域的邊緣與父項目邊緣之間的緩衝區空間。 is buffer space that falls outside an element's content area, between the edges of the element's content area and the edges of the parent element. 與相反，也就是落在項目的內容區域中，元素的內容與內部項目的邊緣之間的緩衝區空間。Contrast with , which is buffer space that falls inside an element's content area, between the element's content and the inner edge of the element. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *uniformThickness**uniformThickness* 單一的字串表示法一致地套用所有的四個粗細維度值。String representation of a single value to apply uniformly to all four thickness dimensions. 例如，值`"10"`相當於針對`"10,10,10,10"`。For example, a value of `"10"` is equivalent to a value of `"10,10,10,10"`. 不合格的值被以與裝置無關的像素。An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels. 字串不需要明確包含小數位數。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. *independentThickness**independentThickness* 四個已排序的字串表示法值對應至獨立的粗細維度 left，top，以滑鼠右鍵，並 bottom，依此順序。String representation of four ordered values corresponding to independent thickness dimensions for left, top, right, and bottom, in this order. 四個值必須是以逗號分隔的;不允許有空格。The four values must be separated with commas; spaces are not allowed. 比方說，「 5,10,15,20"會導致 5 像素邊界的內容及內容上方邊界的 10 個像素、 15 像素的邊界，右邊的內容，內容下方邊界 20 個像素的左邊。For example, "5,10,15,20" results in 5 pixels of margin to the left of content, 10 pixels of margin above content, 15 pixels of margin to the right of content, and 20 pixels of margin below the content. *qualifiedUniformThickness**qualifiedUniformThickness* 所描述的值*uniformThickness*後面接著一個下列的單位規範： `px`， `in`。A value described by *uniformThickness* followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` （預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 是英吋為單位;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px 比方說，`"1in"`提供統一的邊界，往所有方向的 1 英吋。For example, `"1in"` provides uniform margin of 1 inch in all directions. *qualifiedIndependentThickness**qualifiedIndependentThickness* 所描述的值*independentThickness*，以每個獨立的值，後面接著一個下列的單位規範： `px`， `in`。A value described by *independentThickness*, with each independent value followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` （預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 是英吋為單位;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px 例如，`"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`。For example, `"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`. 單位規範可能會混合，或從一個或多個值中省略。Unit specifiers may be mixed or omitted from one or more values. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定的屬性項目 ()。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element (). [!code-xaml[BlockSnippets#_Block_MarginPaddingXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_block_marginpaddingxaml)] 下圖顯示上述範例的轉譯方式。The following figure shows how the preceding example renders. 如需圖例可誇張的粗細和色彩。Exaggerated thicknesses and colors are used for illustration. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 段落與邊框距離及邊界](~/add/media/block-marginpadding.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 使用邊框距離及邊界的段落")![Screenshot: Paragraphs with padding and margins](~/add/media/block-marginpadding.png "Screenshot: Paragraphs with padding and margins") 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[BlockSnippets#_Block_MarginPadding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_block_marginpadding)] [!code-vb[BlockSnippets#_Block_MarginPadding](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_block_marginpadding)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是落在項目的內容區域中，元素的內容與內部項目的邊緣之間的緩衝區空間。 is buffer space that falls inside an element's content area, between the element's content and the inner edge of the element. 與相反，也就是落在外部項目的內容區域，此項目的內容區域的邊緣與父項目邊緣之間的緩衝區空間。Contrast with , which is buffer space that falls outside an element's content area, between the edges of the element's content area and the edges of the parent element. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *uniformThickness**uniformThickness* 單一的字串表示法一致地套用所有的四個粗細維度值。String representation of a single value to apply uniformly to all four thickness dimensions. 例如，值`"10"`相當於針對`"10,10,10,10"`。For example, a value of `"10"` is equivalent to a value of `"10,10,10,10"`. 不合格的值被以與裝置無關的像素。An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels. 字串不需要明確包含小數位數。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. *independentThickness**independentThickness* 四個已排序的字串表示法值對應至獨立的粗細維度 left，top，以滑鼠右鍵，並 bottom，依此順序。String representation of four ordered values corresponding to independent thickness dimensions for left, top, right, and bottom, in this order. 四個值必須是以逗號分隔的;不允許有空格。The four values must be separated with commas; spaces are not allowed. 比方說，「 5,10,15,20"會導致 5 像素的邊框距離左邊的內容、 內容上方填補的 10 個像素、 15 像素的邊框間距右邊的內容和 20 個像素內容下方的填補。For example, "5,10,15,20" results in 5 pixels of padding to the left of content, 10 pixels of padding above content, 15 pixels of padding to the right of content, and 20 pixels of padding below the content. *qualifiedUniformThickness**qualifiedUniformThickness* 所描述的值*uniformThickness*後面接著一個下列的單位規範： `px`， `in`。A value described by *uniformThickness* followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` （預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 是英吋為單位;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px 比方說，`"1in"`提供統一的填補，往所有方向的 1 英吋。For example, `"1in"` provides uniform padding of 1 inch in all directions. *qualifiedIndependentThickness**qualifiedIndependentThickness* 所描述的值*independentThickness*，以每個獨立的值，後面接著一個下列的單位規範： `px`， `in`。A value described by *independentThickness*, with each independent value followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` （預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 是英吋為單位;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px 例如，`"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`。For example, `"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`. 單位規範可能會混合，或從一個或多個值中省略。Unit specifiers may be mixed or omitted from one or more values. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定的屬性項目 ()。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element (). summary.span: 取得 項目的集合，這些項目是目前 項目的同層級項目。

span.span: Gets a collection of elements that are siblings to the current element.

value.span: 包含由目前 項目父項目所裝載的所有子 項目之 ，若目前 項目沒有父代，則為 。

span.span: A that contains the child elements that are directly hosted by the parent of the current element, or if the current element has no parent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性傳回包含透過它存取集合，; 也就是擁有此屬性的項目會被視為它自己的同層級的目的產生同層級項目集合的項目。The returned by this property includes the element through which the collection is accessed; that is, the element that owns this property is considered to be its own sibling for the purposes of generating the collection of siblings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , | ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性的項目。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element. [!code-xaml[BlockSnippets#_Block_TextAlignmentXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_block_textalignmentxaml)] 下圖顯示上述範例中使用的轉譯方式文字對齊方式 （預設值）。The following figure shows how the preceding example renders with text alignment (the default). ![螢幕擷取畫面： TextAlign 屬性值為 Left](~/add/media/flowdoc-textalign-left.png "螢幕擷取畫面： TextAlign 屬性值為 Left")![Screenshot: TextAlign property value of Left](~/add/media/flowdoc-textalign-left.png "Screenshot: TextAlign property value of Left") 下圖顯示相同的範例使用的轉譯方式文字對齊方式。The following figure shows how the same example renders with text alignment. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 權限的 TextAlign 值](~/add/media/flowdoc-textalign-right.png "螢幕擷取畫面： TextAlign 值為 Right")![Screenshot: TextAlign value of Right](~/add/media/flowdoc-textalign-right.png "Screenshot: TextAlign value of Right") 下圖顯示相同的範例使用的轉譯方式文字對齊方式。The following figure shows how the same example renders with text alignment. ![螢幕擷取畫面： TextAlign 屬性值為 Center](~/add/media/flowdoc-textalign-center.png "螢幕擷取畫面： TextAlign 屬性值為 Center")![Screenshot: TextAlign property value of Center](~/add/media/flowdoc-textalign-center.png "Screenshot: TextAlign property value of Center") 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[BlockSnippets#_Block_TextAlignment](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_block_textalignment)] [!code-vb[BlockSnippets#_Block_TextAlignment](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_block_textalignment)]
